item.title: Supra-Laplacian Encoding for Transformer on Dynamic Graphs
item.description: SLATE: Supra-Laplacian encoding for spatio-temporal Transformers achieves state-of-the-art dynamic link prediction by innovatively using a multi-layer graph representation and a unique cross-attention…
